name: Sweet Smothered Pork Chops
author: sasharene
summary: I put together this recipe on a whim, and it has since become a family favorite.
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Lightly coat the inside of a baking dish with butter or butter substitute
Arrange pork chops in the prepared baking dish; season with salt and pepper
Spread mayonnaise over the tops of each pork chop with a spatula
Sprinkle panko bread crumbs over the mayonnaise
Drizzle honey over the bread crumbs
Bake pork chops in the preheated oven until no longer pink in the center, about 45 minutes
An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read 145 degrees F (63 degrees C)
